xlib_symbol.license: Part of X, a Cross-Browser Javascript Library, Distributed under the terms of the GNU LGPL
xlib_symbol.description: This variable gives the X Library version string for the distribution in which this file was included.

comment.author: mf
comment.note: Each X symbol's xml file documents its revisions. This file will have general revision notes relative to the current X version.
